comments:
Build 20020212 + core patch (team 2.0)

1) I have a project that is associated with an ssh connection to the eclipse 
repository.
2) I shutdown and deleted the keyring file.
3) Then in project->Properties->CVS, I tried to change the username and password
4) When I click ok, an internal error dialog pops up.  The dialog contains no 
further details.  The log stack trace is below.

Although this is non-standard behaviour, I don't think it should cause an error 
for the keyring file to be deleted.

Log: Thu Feb 14 17:53:42 EST 2002

This should be fixed in M3. If you get this again, please reopen.
